source.6c847fea:
#Total cases and per day increase in India,Brazil and US since 22 Jan 2020

total_cases_India = []
for i in dates:
    total_cases_India.append(df_confirmed[df_confirmed['Country/Region']=='India'][i].sum())
    
total_cases_US = []
for i in dates:
    total_cases_US.append(df_confirmed[df_confirmed['Country/Region']=='US'][i].sum())
    

total_cases_Brazil = []
for i in dates:
    total_cases_Brazil.append(df_confirmed[df_confirmed['Country/Region']=='Brazil'][i].sum())
    
fig,ax = plt.subplots(3,2,figsize=(18,17))
fig.suptitle('Confirmed Cases in India,US and Brazil - Total Vs. Per day',fontweight='bold',fontsize=20)   


sns.lineplot(x=days_since,y=total_cases_India,color='hotpink',palette="ch:2.5,.25",ax= ax[0][0])
ax[0][0].set_title('Total confirmed cases - India',fontweight='bold',size=10)
ax[0][0].set_xlabel('No of days since 22 Jan 2020',size=10)
ax[0][0].set_ylabel('India Covid Count',size=10)



sns.lineplot(x=days_since,y=per_day_rise(total_cases_India),color='hotpink',palette="ch:2.5,.25",ax=ax[0][1])
ax[0][1].set_title('India per day rise in confirmed cases',fontweight='bold',size=10)
ax[0][1].set_xlabel('No of days since 22 Jan 2020',size=10)
ax[0][1].set_ylabel('India per day rise',size=10)


sns.lineplot(x=days_since,y=total_cases_US,color='hotpink',palette="ch:2.5,.25",ax= ax[1][0])
ax[1][0].set_title('Total confirmed cases - US',fontweight='bold',size=10)
ax[1][0].set_xlabel('No of days since 22 Jan 2020',size=10)
ax[1][0].set_ylabel('US Covid Count',size=10)



sns.lineplot(x=days_since,y=per_day_rise(total_cases_US),color='hotpink',palette="ch:2.5,.25",ax=ax[1][1])
ax[1][1].set_title('US per day rise in confirmed cases',fontweight='bold',size=10)
ax[1][1].set_xlabel('No of days since 22 Jan 2020',size=10)
ax[1][1].set_ylabel('US per day rise',size=10)



sns.lineplot(x=days_since,y=total_cases_Brazil,color='hotpink',palette="ch:2.5,.25",ax= ax[2][0])
ax[2][0].set_title('Total confirmed cases - Brazil',fontweight='bold',size=10)
ax[2][0].set_xlabel('No of days since 22 Jan 2020',size=10)
ax[2][0].set_ylabel('Brazil Covid Count',size=10)


sns.lineplot(x=days_since,y=per_day_rise(total_cases_Brazil),color='hotpink',palette="ch:2.5,.25",ax=ax[2][1])
ax[2][1].set_title('Brazil per day rise in confirmed cases',fontweight='bold',size=10)
ax[2][1].set_xlabel('No of days since 22 Jan 2020',size=10)
ax[2][1].set_ylabel('Brazil per day rise',size=10)

plt.subplots_adjust(hspace=0.4)

plt.show()

ax[0][1].set_ylabel('India per day rise',size=10)

ax[1][0].set_xlabel('No of days since 22 Jan 2020',size=10)
ax[1][0].set_ylabel('US Death Count',size=10)



sns.lineplot(x=days_since,y=per_day_rise(total_deaths_US),color='red',palette="ch:2.5,.25",ax=ax[1][1])

ax[1][1].set_xlabel('No of days since 22 Jan 2020',size=10)

sns.lineplot(x=days_since,y=total_deaths_Brazil,color='red',palette="ch:2.5,.25",ax= ax[2][0])
ax[2][0].set_title('Total Deaths - Brazil',fontweight='bold',size=10)
ax[2][0].set_xlabel('No of days since 22 Jan 2020',size=10)
ax[2][0].set_ylabel('Brazil Death Count',size=10)

total_act_US = np.array(total_cases_US) - np.array(total_rec_US)-np.array(total_deaths_US)

total_act_Brazil = np.array(total_cases_Brazil) - np.array(total_rec_Brazil)-np.array(total_deaths_Brazil)

fig.suptitle('Active Cases in India,US and Brazil - Total Vs. Per day',fontweight='bold',fontsize=20)

source.4f9b5639:
#Selecting Countries for Visualization

top_10 = df_confirmed.iloc[:,[1,-1]].sort_values(by=dates[-1],ascending =False)[:10]
top_10.columns = ['Country/Region','Total Confirmed']
top_10=top_10.reset_index().drop('index',axis=1)
countries= top_10['Country/Region'].to_list()
source.9be959b7:
#confirmed cases

for i in countries:
    country_total_confirmed = []
    for j in dates:
        country_total_confirmed.append(df_confirmed[df_confirmed['Country/Region']==i][j].sum())
    
    plt.figure(figsize = (10,6))
    sns.lineplot(days_since,country_total_confirmed,color='m')
    plt.title('Total Confirmed Cases - {} {}'.format(i,country_total_confirmed[-1]),fontweight='bold',size=20)
    plt.xlabel('No. of days since 22 Jan 2020')
    plt.ylabel('Total Confirmed Cases - {}'.format(i))
    plt.show()
    
    plt.figure(figsize = (10,6))
    sns.lineplot(days_since,per_day_rise(country_total_confirmed),color='m')
    plt.title('Per day rise in Cases - {}'.format(i),fontweight='bold',size=20)
    plt.xlabel('No. of days since 22 Jan 2020')
    plt.ylabel('Per day rise in Cases - {}'.format(i))
    plt.show()
source.572d5d8f:
#deaths
for i in countries:
    country_total_confirmed = []
    for j in dates:
        country_total_confirmed.append(df_deaths[df_deaths['Country/Region']==i][j].sum())
    
    plt.figure(figsize = (10,6))
    sns.lineplot(days_since,country_total_confirmed,color='lightcoral')
    plt.title('Total Death Cases - {} {}'.format(i,country_total_confirmed[-1]),fontweight='bold',size=20)
    plt.xlabel('No. of days since 22 Jan 2020')
    plt.ylabel('Total Death Cases - {}'.format(i))
    plt.show()
    
    plt.figure(figsize = (10,6))
    sns.lineplot(days_since,per_day_rise(country_total_confirmed),color='lightcoral')
    plt.title('Per day rise in Cases - {}'.format(i),fontweight='bold',size=20)
    plt.xlabel('No. of days since 22 Jan 2020')
    plt.ylabel('Per day rise in Cases - {}'.format(i))
    plt.show()
source.95933b74:
#recoveries

for i in countries:
    country_total_confirmed = []
    for j in dates:
        country_total_confirmed.append(df_recoveries[df_recoveries['Country/Region']==i][j].sum())
    
    plt.figure(figsize = (10,6))
    sns.lineplot(days_since,country_total_confirmed,color='lawngreen')
    plt.title('Total recoveries - {} {}'.format(i,country_total_confirmed[-1]),fontweight='bold',size=20)
    plt.xlabel('No. of days since 22 Jan 2020')
    plt.ylabel('Total recoveries - {}'.format(i))
    plt.show()
    
    plt.figure(figsize = (10,6))
    sns.lineplot(days_since,per_day_rise(country_total_confirmed),color='lawngreen')
    plt.title('Per day rise in recoveries - {}'.format(i),fontweight='bold',size=20)
    plt.xlabel('No. of days since 22 Jan 2020')
    plt.ylabel('Per day rise in recoveries - {}'.format(i))
    plt.show()
source.5b684184:
#active cases

for i in countries:
    country_total_confirmed = []
    for j in dates:
        country_total_confirmed.append(df_confirmed[df_confirmed['Country/Region']==i][j].sum()\
                                       -df_recoveries[df_recoveries['Country/Region']==i][j].sum()\
                                      -df_deaths[df_deaths['Country/Region']==i][j].sum())
    
    plt.figure(figsize = (10,6))
    sns.lineplot(days_since,country_total_confirmed,color='black')
    plt.title('Total Acitve Cases - {} {}'.format(i,country_total_confirmed[-1]),fontweight='bold',size=20)
    plt.xlabel('No. of days since 22 Jan 2020')
    plt.ylabel('Total Acitve Cases - {}'.format(i))
    plt.show()
    
    plt.figure(figsize = (10,6))
    sns.lineplot(days_since,per_day_rise(country_total_confirmed),color='black')
    plt.title('Per day change in Acitve Cases - {}'.format(i),fontweight='bold',size=20)
    plt.xlabel('No. of days since 22 Jan 2020')
    plt.ylabel('Per day change in Acitve Cases - {}'.format(i))
    plt.show()

source.b1a60515:
df_state = df_latest.loc[:,['Country_Region','Province_State','Confirmed','Deaths','Recovered']]
df_state = df_state.groupby(['Country_Region','Province_State']).sum().reset_index()
df_state['Mortality %'] = (df_state['Deaths']/df_state['Confirmed'])*100
df_state['Recovery %'] = (df_state['Recovered']/df_state['Confirmed'])*100
df_state['Active %'] = ((df_state['Confirmed']-df_state['Recovered']-df_state['Deaths'])/df_state['Confirmed'])*100
df_state.head()
source.95dfdbd9:
#replacing infinity and non infinity errors from data (these occoured due to inaccurately recored data
# such as 0 confirmed cases but 1 or more values in recovery/deaths)
df_state.replace(np.inf,np.nan,inplace=True)
df_state.replace(-np.inf,np.nan,inplace=True)
source.b11a998e:
#selecting metrics on which state wise analysis is done
metrics = df_state.columns[2:-1]
metrics

source.47a44284:
# Table of Content
##### Notes 
- Top 10 countries with maximum confirmed cases till date have been selected for the analysis in point 5 of parts A,B,C,D and for the parts F,G,H below.

- A portion of analysis has been done using df_latest dataframe. The same has can be updated by updating the date in the name of the file. Daily reports are generated for this purpose. 

## A. Confirmed Cases

1. **[Total confirmed cases in the world](#a)**
2. **[Per day rise in confirmed cases in the world](#b)**
3. **[Top 5 Countries with the maximum confirmed cases till date](#c)**
4. **[Side by side comparison of India, US and Brazil - Confirmed](#d)**
5. **[Total confirmed and per day rise in confirmed cases](#p)** 


## B. Death Cases

1. **[Total deaths in the world](#e)**
2. **[Per day rise in confirmed deaths in the world](#f)**
3. **[Top 5 Countries with the maximum death cases till date](#g)**
4. **[Side by side comparison of India, US and Brazil - Deaths](#h)**
5. **[Total deaths and per day rise in death cases](#q)**


## C. Recoveries

1. **[Total recoveries in the world](#i)**
2. **[Per day rise in recoveries in the world](#j)**
3. **[Top 5 Countries with the maximum recoveries till date](#k)**
4. **[Side by side comparison of India, US and Brazil - Recoveries](#l)**
5. **[Total recoveries and per day rise in recoveries](#r)**


## D. Active Cases

1. **[Total active cases in the world](#m)**
2. **[World per day change in active cases](#n)**
3. **[Top 5 Countries with the maximum active cases till date](#nono)**
4. **[Side by side comparison of India, US and Brazil - Active](#o)** 
5. **[Total active and per day rise in active cases](#s)**


## **[E. Analyzing mortality rates, death rates and active ratios](#t)**

- Top 7 Countries with highest mortality rates
- Top 7 Countries with highest recovery rates
- Top 7 Countries with highest % of active cases

## **[F. Distribution of mortality,recovery and active cases within a country](#u)**

## **[G. All-in-one state-wise analysis](#v)**

## **[H. Numbers for State-wise Analysis](#w)**
